description: This Kotlin source file defines the DashboardViewModel class used in the UI layer to manage and fetch current weather data asynchronously, maintaining UI state through a reactive flow.

classes.name: DashboardViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel responsible for loading and managing current weather data, exposing state to the UI layer.

classes.name: DashboardState
classes.description: A data class representing the UI state for the dashboard, including weather info, loading status, and error messages.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads weather data for a specified city (default is Berlin) and updates the state accordingly.
